list.definition: One of [the many] slang terms for the drug [OC], that is [Oxycontin].
list.author: Iloveoc
list.example: I'll pick up 2 [80's] of sizzle and some [thizzle] for [my hoes].

list.author: AYB
list.example: Those barbecued [pork ribs] [sure] did sizzle on [my grill].

list.definition:
1. To [smoke weed], to [burn]. 
2. To be [engaged in] an activity
list.author: Bagg

list.definition:
To humorously mock or [humiliate] someone with a well-timed joke, [diss] or [comeback].

Noun form: the aforementioned joke, diss or comeback. 

See also roast
list.author: Creff von Crinklepants
list.example: "I just had to sizzle Knooch about that [chubby] [chick he] [frenched] last night."

list.definition: [Crack Cocaine] or The act of [smoking crack] [cocaine].
list.author: ChroNICK AZ
list.example: "Are you [cooking] that shit yet?, I wanna sizzle!" or "That [crazy fool] went all the way down to the [grind] to score some sizzle"

list.definition: To sizzle someone is to walk around a [public] place [poking] people as they [walk by] while saying "SSSSSSSSSSSSSS."
list.author: kaymegbren23
list.example:
Girl 1: [Ooooo] sizzle this guy coming up!

Girl 2: Okay!

*Pokes guy* [SSSSSSSSSSSSS]

Guy: *Looks* Wtf?

Girls: You've been [sizzled].

list.author: yeah-la
list.example:
1. Are you sizzle?

2. John won't [tell me] if he's sizzle [or not].

list.definition:
When something is being [burned] or barbecued.
Some [word that] stupid [rappers] use when they have nothing to say.
list.author: dsgsfgregrg
Shoota
list.example: Hey call [the man] for [the sizzle] so i can [blizzle]

list.definition: To [smoke crack] - derived from the sound the rock makes as the lighter SIZZLES it down into the "[chore boy]" creating that oh so sweet smoke and resin - continuous smokers are referred to as sizzle heads, and the rocks called sizzle stones, the act of smoking is called [sizzlin]
list.author: Chiki&Blaze
list.example: Ask sizzle head Sharon if she [sizzled] up all her sizzle stones yet cause I know how much of a [sizzler] she is but if not yet, can she sizzle with us because I really feel like [sizzlin] -
